text: adulting hits different for everyone - regular bills? still counts 👌
realizing i was more excited about kitchenware than clubbing - adulthood hit hard!
night shifts suck when creativity tanks
deadlines may suck but they're sometimes stepping stones too... wish things were simpler but don’t we all? gotta find that sweet spot between grind & sanity somehow! 😅
noticed i can't stop critiquing menu layouts when eating out... it's like these fonts & colors won’t let me enjoy my food in peace 😅 perks of always being 'in design mode' lol
eh idk my design background kinda makes me appreciate chaotic creative mess cities offer over toughness — adds color to my work 😌
definitely! feels more balanced when surrounded by creativity – gotta love those cozy design vibes 😌
def feel fairy tale charm sparked creativityünstoppable
